actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 108-161.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 304.

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the National Telecommunications and Information Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Telecommunications and Information Administration Organization Act to: (1) extend through FY 2008 the authorization of appropriations for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA) and the NTIA Technology Opportunities Program; and (2) require the NTIA to assess fees from Federal agencies for the costs of assigning spectrum or providing spectrum management functions.

titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the National Telecommunications and Information Administration, and for other purposes.
